Package com.davidbracewell.stream.accumulator

Unified Accumulator interface to work for Local and Spark streams

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MAccumulator<IN,OUT>
    Base interface for accumulators that can work across local and distributed streams.
    MCounterAccumulator<T>
    Accumulator for Counters
    MDoubleAccumulator
    Accumulator for doubles
    MLongAccumulator
    Accumulator for longs
    MMapAccumulator<K,V>
    Accumulator for Maps
    MMultiCounterAccumulator<K1,K2>
    An accumulator for MultiCounters
    MStatisticsAccumulator
    Accumulator for calculating descriptive statistics
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccumulatorV2Wrapper<IN,OUT>
    Wraps a LocalMAccumulator making it usable by Spark
    LocalMAccumulator<IN,OUT>
    Abstract base for local accumulators.
    LocalMCounterAccumulator<IN>
    An implementation of a MCounterAccumulator for local streams
    LocalMDoubleAccumulator
    An implementation of a MDoubleAccumulator for local streams
    LocalMListAccumulator<E>
    An implementation of a MAccumulator that accumulates values in lists for local streams
    LocalMLongAccumulator
    An implementation of a MLongAccumulator for local streams
    LocalMMapAccumulator<K,V>
    An implementation of a MMapAccumulator for local streams
    LocalMMultiCounterAccumulator<K1,K2>
    An implementation of a MMultiCounterAccumulator for local streams
    LocalMSetAccumulator<E>
    An implementation of a MAccumulator that accumulates values in a set for local streams
    LocalMStatisticsAccumulator
    An implementation of a MStatisticsAccumulator for local streams
    SparkMAccumulator<IN,OUT>
    Generic accumulator for distributed Spark streams.
    SparkMCounterAccumulator<E>
    Counter accumulator implementation for Spark streams
    SparkMDoubleAccumulator
    An implementation of a MDoubleAccumulator for spark streams
    SparkMLongAccumulator
    An implementation of a MLongAccumulator for spark streams
    SparkMMapAccumulator<K,V>
    An implementation of a MMapAccumulator for Spark streams
    SparkMMultiCounterAccumulator<K1,K2>
    An implementation of a MMultiCounterAccumulator for Spark streams
    SparkMStatisticsAccumulator
    An implementation of a MStatisticsAccumulator for Spark streams

Package com.davidbracewell.stream.accumulator Description

Unified Accumulator interface to work for Local and Spark streams
